Name: LU 683 - Zoning, 1510 Broadway, Brooklyn (C 200083 PQK)
Title: Resolution approving the decision of the City Planning Commission on ULURP Application No. C 200083 PQK, for the acquisition of property located at 1510 Broadway (Block 1489, p/o Lot 11), to facilitate transit infrastructure, Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 16 (L.U. No. 683; C 200083 PQK).

History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee
A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved, by Council approved by consent Roll Call.

{\rtf1\fbidis\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1033\deflangfe1033{\fonttbl{\f0\froman\fprq2\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}{\f1\fmodern\fprq1\fcharset0 Courier;}}

\viewkind4\uc1
\pard\ltrpar\qj\v0\par
\pard\ltrpar\keepn\nowidctlpar\s1\qj\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928 By Council Members Salamanca and Moya\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\b0\f1\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\f0 WHEREAS, the New York City Department of Citywide Administrative Services (DCAS), filed an application pursuant to Section 197-c of the New York City Charter for the acquisition of property located at 1510 Broadway (Block 1489, p/o Lot 11), which in conjunction with the related actions would facilitate the development of a new mixed-use building with approximately 107 units of affordable housing and commercial space on City-owned vacant land at 1510 Broadway in the Ocean Hill neighborhood of Brooklyn, Community District 16 (ULURP No. C 200083 PQK), (the "Application");\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tab WHEREAS, the City Planning Commission filed with the Council on September 18, 2020, its decision dated September 16, 2020 (the "Decision") on the Application;\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\b\i\tab\b0\i0 WHEREAS, the Application is related to applications N 200082 ZRK (L.U. No. 682), a zoning text amendment to designate a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing (MIH) area; C 200084 HAK (L.U. No. 684), an Urban Development Action Area designation, project approval, and disposition of City-owned property to a developer selected by HPD; and C 200085 ZMK (L.U. No. 685), a zoning map amendment to rezone the project area from R6/C1-3 to R7-1/C2-4;\par
\pard\ltrpar\keepn\nowidctlpar\s2\qj\tx720\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\tab WHEREAS, the Decision is subject to review and action by the Council pursuant to Section 197-d of the City Charter;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj       \tab WHEREAS, upon due notice, the Council held a public hearing on the Decision and Application on September 24, 2020;\par
\par
\tab WHEREAS, the Council has considered the land use implications and other policy issues relating to the Decision and Application; and\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tab WHEREAS, the Council has considered the relevant environmental issues, including the Revised Negative Declaration issued November 21\super st\nosupersub , 2019, which supersedes the Negative Declaration issued October 7\super th\nosupersub , 2019, (CEQR No. 19HPD057K) which include an (E) designation to avoid the potential for significant adverse impacts related to hazardous materials and noise (E-536) (the \ldblquote Revised Negative Declaration\rdblquote ).\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\par
RESOLVED:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tab The Council finds that the action described herein will have no significant impact on the environment as set forth in the (E) Designation (E-536) and Revised Negative Declaration.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tab Pursuant to Section 197-d of the City Charter and on the basis of the Decision and Application, and based on the environmental determination and consideration described in the report, C 200083 PQK, incorporated by reference herein, and the record before the Council, the Council approves the Decision of the City Planning Commission.\tab\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\par
Adopted.\par
\par
      \tab Office of the City Clerk, \}\par
      \tab The City of New York,  \} ss.:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx864\tx1800\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928     \tab      \tab  I hereby certify that the foregoing is a true copy of a Resolution passed by The Council of The City of New York on __________, 2020, on file in this office.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qr\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\par
